props.className: flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-900 p-4
p-2 rounded-md border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-700 mb-4 focus:outline-none focus:ring focus:ring-blue-500 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100
props.onchange: var oldValue = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('traqix_mem_city'));var dataSave = JSON.stringify({...oldValue, value: e.target.value});window.localStorage.setItem('traqix_mem_city', dataSave);

props.className: px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white font-semibold rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 transition duration-300 ease-in-out
props.onclick:
var city = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('traqix_mem_city')).value ?? ''; if (city !== '') { fetch(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&appid=0d019a678e59d7111413243a36716e41&units=metric`).then(response => response.json()).then(data => { window.localStorage.setItem('traqix_mem_weather', JSON.stringify({type: 'object', value: data})); var result = `City: ${data.name}
Temperature: ${data.main.temp} °C
Min Temp: ${data.main.temp_min} °C
Max Temp: ${data.main.temp_max} °C
Humidity: ${data.main.humidity}%
Wind Speed: ${data.wind.speed} m/s
Conditions: ${data.weather[0].description}`; window.localStorage.setItem('traqix_mem_display', JSON.stringify({type: 'string', value: result})); }).catch(error => { window.localStorage.setItem('traqix_mem_display', JSON.stringify({type: 'string', value: 'Error fetching weather data'})); }); }

props.className: mt-4 text-lg font-medium text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-200 whitespace-pre-wrap
